post.text: Trump "doesn't look at us as full human beings, with our dreams and our purposes, our own capabilities."

comment.author: Taylor
comment.text: Trump shouldn't be president if he thinks anything he can say is consequence free. America doesn't need a president that is insensitive.

replies.author: Joseph
replies.text: Taylor WAKE UP Hillary is the corrupt one. Can't believe EVERYONE doesn't see that

replies.author: Izabella
replies.text: Taylor ... please try and keep up. Mmmmkay?
